declarations.comments: A layer that requires dependencies (req) and provides services (prov)
declarations.title: OmLayer

declarations.comments: Helper to create a layer from an Om computation
declarations.title: makeLayer

declarations.comments: Run a layer with a given context, with custom error if requirements aren't met
declarations.title: runLayer

declarations.comments: The key function: combine two layers with automatic deduplication
declarations.title: combineRequirements

declarations.comments:
Vertical composition: feed output of one layer into input of another
This is the >>> operator from ZIO ZLayer

Example:
  postgresLive :: OmLayer (config :: Config) (postgres :: SQL) ()
  userRepoLive :: OmLayer (postgres :: SQL) (userRepo :: UserRepo) ()
  
  composed = userRepoLive `provide` postgresLive
  -- Result: OmLayer (config :: Config) (userRepo :: UserRepo) ()
declarations.title: provide

declarations.comments: Check if all required dependencies are provided
declarations.title: CheckAllProvided

declarations.comments: Check that all labels in required RowList exist in available RowList
declarations.title: CheckAllLabelsExist

declarations.comments: Check if a single label exists in the available RowList
declarations.title: CheckLabelExists
